content: उद्गारः [उद्-गॄ-घञ् <ls>P. III. 3. 29</ls>] {@--1@} ({%a%}) Ejection, spitting out, vomiting, giving out, emitting; खर्जूरीस्कंधनद्धानां मदोद्गारसुगंधिषु <ls>R. 4. 57</ls>; <ls>Bh. 2. 36</ls>; सलिलोद्गारमुच्चैर्विमानाः <ls>Me. 63</ls>, <ls n="Me.">69</ls>; <ls>Śi. 12. 9.</ls> ({%b%}) Oozing, flowing out, stream, issuing out; सनिर्झरोद्गार इवाद्रिराजः <ls>R. 6. 60</ls>; रुधिर°दिग्धाखिलांगाः <ls>Mv. 6. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Repeating, narration, citing repeatedly; <ls>Māl. 2. 13</ls>; साम° <ls>K. 42</ls>; <ls>H. 3. 106</ls>; सौजन्य° <ls>Mv. 4</ls> expression of goodness. {@--3@} Quantity, mass (thrown out); <ls>Mu. 3.</ls> {@--4@} Spittle, saliva. {@--5@} Eructation, belching. {@--6@} Sound, roaring, echo, hissing sound (शब्दः, कंठगर्जनं, नागवायुकर्म); <ls>Śānti. 1. 21</ls>; गंभीरगह्वर° <ls>Māl. 9.</ls>
